metadata.title: How to Create YouTube Shorts 2025: Complete Guide
metadata.description: Create effective YouTube Shorts. Format, strategy, and optimization for short-form success.

hero.headline: How to Create YouTube Shorts
hero.subheadline: Master short-form content. Vertical videos that capture attention fast.

sections.content: YouTube Shorts are vertical videos under 60 seconds designed for quick consumption. They're a massive discovery opportunity—billions of views daily. Whether repurposing long-form or creating original shorts, here's how to make them work.

content.title: 60 Seconds Max
content.description: Under 60 seconds to qualify as Short. Shorter often better.

content.title: #Shorts Tag
content.description: Include in title or description. Helps YouTube categorize.

content.title: Clip Long-Form
content.description: Best moments from full videos. Repurpose existing content.

content.title: Original Shorts
content.description: Quick tips, reactions, trends. Made specifically for format.

content.title: Series Format
content.description: Part 1, 2, 3 structure. Build anticipation across Shorts.

faq.question: Do Shorts help channel growth?
faq.answer: Yes for reach and subscribers. Shorts get massive impressions. But watch time from Shorts doesn't count toward YPP watch hours (separate path).

faq.question: Can I repurpose TikToks?
faq.answer: Yes, but remove TikTok watermarks. YouTube may limit reach of watermarked content. Re-edit or use original files.

faq.question: How often should I post Shorts?
faq.answer: 1-3 per day is common for growth. Consistency matters more than volume. Find sustainable cadence for you.

faq.question: Shorts vs long-form—which matters more?
faq.answer: Both have value. Shorts for discovery and reach. Long-form for watch time and deeper engagement. Many creators do both.
